channel.title: Fixed*
channel.description:
[s]I'm currently working on dialogues on my server and I'm missing three methods which handle NPC dialogue. I have the sendNpcChat4 method, but I need the first, second and third. I've already tried making them myself by removing strings in the other methods to apply to what I want, but instead of having a blank line, it just shows Line2, Line3, Line4, etc. If anyone knows how to fix that or if you have the methods, please post them below. :)[/s]
Nevermind, found them in an old project of mine.

item.title: Fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Krim Krim
item.description:
@Krim wrote:

I’m currently working on dialogues on my server and I’m missing three methods which handle NPC dialogue. I have the sendNpcChat4 method, but I need the first, second and third. I’ve already tried making them myself by removing strings in the other methods to apply to what I want, but instead of having a blank line, it just shows Line2, Line3, Line4, etc. If anyone knows how to fix that or if you have the methods, please post them below.

Nevermind, found them in an old project of mine.
